Subject: Put your heads between your knees and kiss your tailplates goodbye

Phobia listened in on all the conversations around him. all this love 
waste byproduct was making him ill. (To bad transformers don't have 
air sick bags) It was time to let them in on the secret. "Will 
everyone please..."

BOOM

An explosion rocked the ship coming from the engine room.

"What the Pit is going on?" Phobia knew the truth but had 
underestimated the timer on the bomb. (Waterworld 2 hit the theatres? 
oops wrong bomb) But there was still worse consequences. "The cargo 
hold!!!!!" The cargo hold was right above where the bomb had gone 
off, If the explosion reached the crate with the decimator rifles all 
Pit would break loose.

"Dump cargo" he yelled, hitting the release. Sparks erupted from the 
console, warning lights flickered to life, fire suppresion systems 
all jumped into action. "Initiate bridge ejection" His command came 
to late A second explosion in the cargo hold had knocked out all 
remaining power (Anyone in the cargo hold can post damage.)

"Starscream, Goldeneye, and anyone else who can fly blast free and 
get whomever you can to safety the rest of you brace for impact"---
